code:
function getpos(f,t)
  local v=f*1000.0+t
  local d=0.0+pow(f,0.5)*0.8*(1+sin(f*6.25+t*2)*0.2)
  return cos(v)*d, sin(v)*d
end
function update()
 local t=getTime()
 local pcount=500
 for i=0,pcount do
   local f=i/pcount
   local p0x,p0y=getpos(f,t);
   local p1x,p1y=getpos((i+1)/pcount,t);
   line(p0x,p0y,p1x,p1y, abs(sin(f*500.0)))
 end
end
